The father, having found the murderer, was very angry and cut off Xiao Qiang's head and threw it into the well. Xiao Mei also came to inquire. In front of her, Father split open Xiao Qiang's head and invited Xiao Mei to eat the 'cold watermelon.' Bright red liquid splattered all over Xiao Mei's face, and she was scared mad!
tips: 'I got fat' refers to 'my' (the narrator's) body bloating after drowning in the well water.
The well is a key location; it contains not only watermelons but also a corpse.
'Watermelon' in the story does not always refer to the actual fruit; sometimes it's a substitute (e.g., a head).
Xiao Qiang and Xiao Mei are the murderers of 'me' (the narrator).
The father found out the truth and used the well and 'watermelons' to take revenge on Xiao Qiang and Xiao Mei.

title: Making Dumplings
surface: Mom kept making dumplings. We couldn't eat anymore, but Mom kept making dumplings, so we could only keep eating.
bottom: Mom was a caregiver in an orphanage; we all called her Mom. But Mom was very strict. If we didn't obey, we would be severely beaten. Often, children with severe injuries died. Mom told us this was the consequence of not listening to her. We were terrified. To prevent others from finding out, Mom would make the dead children into meat fillings for dumplings and feed them to us. If we didn't obey, we would die like those children. We could only obediently listen and eat these dumplings.
tips: 'Mom' is not the biological mother but a caregiver in a specific institution (orphanage caregiver).
'We' refers to a group of children (orphans).
The dumpling filling is problematic (human flesh).
'Mom' engages in abuse and even murder of children.
The children eat the dumplings not voluntarily, but out of fear and coercion.

title: Rock, Paper, Scissors
surface: Gurgle gurgle... Rock, paper, scissors! How could this be? The next day, the police found my body.
bottom: After a breakup, I drank a lot alone. On my way home, I went to a public restroom. It was very dark inside. I suddenly had the idea to play rock, paper, scissors with the mirror. Unexpectedly, my reflection won... It turned out it wasn't a mirror, but a window. Opposite the window stood a murderer.
tips: The dark environment where the game took place is key.
The surface thought to be a mirror was actually transparent.
The deceased played rock, paper, scissors with an object that looked like a mirror.
The result of rock, paper, scissors was physically impossible (the other side won).
There was someone on the other side of the 'mirror' in the dark.
The person on the other side of the 'mirror' caused my death.

title: Doll
surface: There was an extra doll downstairs. After a breakup, I died upstairs.
bottom: Valentine's Day was approaching, and suddenly a large, human-shaped doll appeared downstairs. I thought it was a holiday decoration and didn't pay much attention, living my life normally and gradually getting used to its presence. Until one day, my boyfriend and I broke up. One night when I was coming home alone, out of habit, I didn't notice anything unusual about the doll. It turned out there was a pervert hidden inside it. He followed me upstairs and killed me in my home.
tips: The doll's size was unusual, close to life-size.
The deceased had recently experienced a breakup.
The deceased had become accustomed to the doll's presence.
The internal structure of the doll is related to the case.
The murderer used the doll as a cover and a means of approach.
Negligence after the breakup was one of the key factors leading to the tragedy.

title: Kitten
surface: While on a business trip, I saw someone sharing some cat pictures on my phone; they looked a lot like my kitten. After returning home, I was terrified and heartbroken.
bottom: I had a very cute kitten. Before a business trip, I hired a housekeeper to take care of it. During the trip, I saw pictures posted by an animal abuser on my phone. Many cat lovers were very angry, and I also felt very uncomfortable, especially since that cat looked a lot like my kitten. I finally returned home. However, when I opened the door, what greeted me wasn't a gentle meow, but a scene of destruction. It turned out the housekeeper I hired was the person who abused cats, took pictures, and uploaded them.
tips: The protagonist was on a business trip and entrusted the cat to someone else's care.
The protagonist hired housekeeping services.
The protagonist saw images related to cat abuse online.
The cat in the online pictures had similar features to the protagonist's cat.
The housekeeper is connected to the cat abuse incident.

title: Fingerprint
surface:
Beep! Fingerprint verification failed.
Beep! Fingerprint verification failed.
After 9 tries
Click! Fingerprint verification successful. So I am not far from death.
bottom:
It was already midnight and my husband hadn't returned. At 1 AM, a sound from outside the door woke me up.
'Beep! Fingerprint verification failed.' I realized someone was outside trying to open the fingerprint lock.
Click! Fingerprint verification successful. I guessed my husband had already been killed, his fingers all cut off, and they were trying to open the lock finger by finger. The door opened, and I was doomed.
tips: The husband had not returned late at night and had already been murdered.
The object of the fingerprint verification was 'my' (the narrator's) house door.
The person outside the door was the husband's murderer.
After trying many fingers, the door was finally opened.
The person opening the lock used the husband's fingers.

title: Amusement Park
surface: A mother and son were playing in an amusement park. A few days later, they died at home.
bottom: During their outing, the mother and son took a selfie and accidentally captured a fleeing criminal in the photo. They uploaded their amusement park photos online, and unfortunately, the criminal saw them. Other photos of the mother and son revealed their home address, which the criminal found, and soon after, he came to their home and killed them both.
tips: They took photos at the amusement park.
An unexpected person was captured in the photos.
The photos were detrimental to the murderer.
The photos were uploaded online.
The murderer found their address through the online photos.
